00068 /* Private Variables ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00069 static void can_SetBaudrate (LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx, uint32_t baudrate);
00070 
00071 /*********************************************************************/
00079 static void can_SetBaudrate (LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx, uint32_t baudrate)
00080 {
00081         uint32_t result = 0;
00082         uint8_t NT, TSEG1, TSEG2, BRFail;
00083         uint32_t CANPclk = 0;
00084         uint32_t BRP;
00085         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00086 
00087         if (CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00088         {
00089                 CANPclk = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CAN1);
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 CANPclk = CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CAN2);
00094         }
00095         result = CANPclk / baudrate;
00096         /* Calculate suitable nominal time value
00097          * NT (nominal time) = (TSEG1 + TSEG2 + 3)
00098          * NT <= 24
00099          * TSEG1 >= 2*TSEG2
00100          */
00101         BRFail = 1;
00102         for(NT=24;NT>0;NT=NT-2)
00103         {
00104                 if ((result%NT)==0)
00105                 {
00106                         BRP = result / NT - 1;
00107                         NT--;
00108                         TSEG2 = (NT/3) - 1;
00109                         TSEG1 = NT -(NT/3) - 1;
00110                         BRFail = 0;
00111                         break;
00112                 }
00113         }
00114         if(BRFail)
00115                 while(1); // Failed to calculate exact CAN baud rate
00116         /* Enter reset mode */
00117         CANx->MOD = 0x01;
00118         /* Set bit timing
00119          * Default: SAM = 0x00;
00120          *          SJW = 0x03;
00121          */
00122         CANx->BTR  = (TSEG2<<20)|(TSEG1<<16)|(3<<14)|BRP;
00123         /* Return to normal operating */
00124         CANx->MOD = 0;
00125 }
00126 /* End of Private Functions ----------------------------------------------------*/
00127 
00128 
00129 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00134 /********************************************************************/
00142 void CAN_Init(LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx, uint32_t baudrate)
00143 {
00144         uint32_t temp;
00145         uint16_t i;
00146         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00147 
00148         if(CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00149         {
00150                 /* Turn on power and clock for CAN1 */
00151                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR(CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAN1, ENABLE);
00152                 /* Set clock divide for CAN1 */
00153         }
00154         else
00155         {
00156                 /* Turn on power and clock for CAN1 */
00157                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR(CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAN2, ENABLE);
00158                 /* Set clock divide for CAN2 */
00159         }
00160         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CAN1, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_2);
00161         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CAN2, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_2);
00162         CLKPWR_SetPCLKDiv (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_ACF, CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_CCLK_DIV_2);
00163 
00164         CANx->MOD = 1; // Enter Reset Mode
00165         CANx->IER = 0; // Disable All CAN Interrupts
00166         CANx->GSR = 0;
00167         /* Request command to release Rx, Tx buffer and clear data overrun */
00168         //CANx->CMR = CAN_CMR_AT | CAN_CMR_RRB | CAN_CMR_CDO;
00169         CANx->CMR = (1<<1)|(1<<2)|(1<<3);
00170         /* Read to clear interrupt pending in interrupt capture register */
00171         temp = CANx->ICR;
00172         CANx->MOD = 0;// Return Normal operating
00173 
00174         //Reset CANAF value
00175         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x01;
00176 
00177         //clear ALUT RAM
00178         for (i = 0; i < 512; i++) {
00179                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[i] = 0x00;
00180         }
00181 
00182         LPC_CANAF->SFF_sa = 0x00;
00183         LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa = 0x00;
00184         LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa = 0x00;
00185         LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa = 0x00;
00186         LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable = 0x00;
00187 
00188         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00;
00189         /* Set baudrate */
00190         can_SetBaudrate (CANx, baudrate);
00191 }
00192 
00193 /********************************************************************/
00200 void CAN_DeInit(LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx)
00201 {
00202         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00203 
00204         if(CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00205         {
00206                 /* Turn on power and clock for CAN1 */
00207                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR(CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAN1, DISABLE);
00208         }
00209         else
00210         {
00211                 /* Turn on power and clock for CAN1 */
00212                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR(CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAN2, DISABLE);
00213         }
00214 }

00216 /********************************************************************/
00227 CAN_ERROR CAN_SetupAFLUT(LPC_CANAF_TypeDef* CANAFx, AF_SectionDef* AFSection)
00228 {
00229         uint8_t ctrl1,ctrl2;
00230         uint8_t dis1, dis2;
00231         uint16_t SID, ID_temp,i, count = 0;
00232         uint32_t EID, entry, buf;
00233         uint16_t lowerSID, upperSID;
00234         uint32_t lowerEID, upperEID;
00235 
00236         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANAFx(CANAFx));
00237         CANAFx->AFMR = 0x01;
00238 
00239 /***** setup FullCAN Table *****/
00240         if(AFSection->FullCAN_Sec == NULL)
00241         {
00242                 FULLCAN_ENABLE = DISABLE;
00243         }
00244         else
00245         {
00246                 FULLCAN_ENABLE = ENABLE;
00247                 for(i=0;i<(AFSection->FC_NumEntry);i++)
00248                 {
00249                         if(count + 1 > 64)
00250                         {
00251                                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00252                         }
00253                         ctrl1 = AFSection->FullCAN_Sec->controller;
00254                         SID = AFSection->FullCAN_Sec->id_11;
00255                         dis1 = AFSection->FullCAN_Sec->disable;
00256 
00257                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl1));
00258                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_11(SID));
00259                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_MSG_DISABLE(dis1));
00260                         entry = 0x00; //reset entry value
00261                         if((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt & 0x00000001)==0)
00262                         {
00263                                 if(count!=0x00)
00264                                 {
00265                                         buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count-1];
00266                                         ID_temp = (buf & 0xE7FF); //mask controller & identifier bits
00267                                         if(ID_temp > ((ctrl1<<13)|SID))
00268                                         {
00269                                                 return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00270                                         }
00271                                 }
00272                                 entry = (ctrl1<<29)|(dis1<<28)|(SID<<16)|(1<<27);
00273                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] &= 0x0000FFFF;
00274                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] |= entry;
00275                                 CANAF_FullCAN_cnt++;
00276                                 if(CANAF_FullCAN_cnt == AFSection->FC_NumEntry) //this is the lastest FullCAN entry
00277                                         count++;
00278                         }
00279                         else
00280                         {
00281                                 buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count];
00282                                 ID_temp = (buf >>16) & 0xE7FF;
00283                                 if(ID_temp > ((ctrl1<<13)|SID))
00284                                 {
00285                                         return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00286                                 }
00287                                 entry = (ctrl1<<13)|(dis1<<12)|(SID<<0)|(1<<11);
00288                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] &= 0xFFFF0000;
00289                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count]|= entry;
00290                                 count++;
00291                                 CANAF_FullCAN_cnt++;
00292                         }
00293                         AFSection->FullCAN_Sec = (FullCAN_Entry *)((uint32_t)(AFSection->FullCAN_Sec)+ sizeof(FullCAN_Entry));
00294                 }
00295         }
00296 
00297 /***** Setup Explicit Standard Frame Format Section *****/
00298         if(AFSection->SFF_Sec != NULL)
00299         {
00300                 for(i=0;i<(AFSection->SFF_NumEntry);i++)
00301                 {
00302                         if(count + 1 > 512)
00303                         {
00304                                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00305                         }
00306                         ctrl1 = AFSection->SFF_Sec->controller;
00307                         SID = AFSection->SFF_Sec->id_11;
00308                         dis1 = AFSection->SFF_Sec->disable;
00309 
00310                         //check parameter
00311                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl1));
00312                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_11(SID));
00313                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_MSG_DISABLE(dis1));
00314 
00315                         entry = 0x00; //reset entry value
00316                         if((CANAF_std_cnt & 0x00000001)==0)
00317                         {
00318                                 if(CANAF_std_cnt !=0 )
00319                                 {
00320                                         buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count-1];
00321                                         ID_temp = (buf & 0xE7FF); //mask controller & identifier bits
00322                                         if(ID_temp > ((ctrl1<<13)|SID))
00323                                         {
00324                                                 return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00325                                         }
00326                                 }
00327                                 entry = (ctrl1<<29)|(dis1<<28)|(SID<<16);
00328                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] &= 0x0000FFFF;
00329                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] |= entry;
00330                                 CANAF_std_cnt++;
00331                                 if(CANAF_std_cnt == AFSection->SFF_NumEntry)//if this is the last SFF entry
00332                                         count++;
00333                         }
00334                         else
00335                         {
00336                                 buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count];
00337                                 ID_temp = (buf >>16) & 0xE7FF;
00338                                 if(ID_temp > ((ctrl1<<13)|SID))
00339                                 {
00340                                         return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00341                                 }
00342                                 entry = (ctrl1<<13)|(dis1<<12)|(SID<<0);
00343                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] &= 0xFFFF0000;
00344                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] |= entry;
00345                                 count++;
00346                                 CANAF_std_cnt++;
00347                         }
00348                         AFSection->SFF_Sec = (SFF_Entry *)((uint32_t)(AFSection->SFF_Sec)+ sizeof(SFF_Entry));
00349                 }
00350         }
00351 
00352 /***** Setup Group of Standard Frame Format Identifier Section *****/
00353         if(AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec != NULL)
00354         {
00355                 for(i=0;i<(AFSection->SFF_GPR_NumEntry);i++)
00356                 {
00357                         if(count + 1 > 512)
00358                         {
00359                                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00360                         }
00361                         ctrl1 = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->controller1;
00362                         ctrl2 = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->controller2;
00363                         dis1 = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->disable1;
00364                         dis2 = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->disable2;
00365                         lowerSID = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->lowerID;
00366                         upperSID = AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec->upperID;
00367 
00368                         /* check parameter */
00369                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl1));
00370                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl2));
00371                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_MSG_DISABLE(dis1));
00372                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_MSG_DISABLE(dis2));
00373                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_11(lowerSID));
00374                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_11(upperSID));
00375 
00376                         entry = 0x00;
00377                         if(CANAF_gstd_cnt!=0)
00378                         {
00379                                 buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count-1];
00380                                 ID_temp = buf & 0xE7FF;
00381                                 if((ctrl1 != ctrl2)||(lowerSID > upperSID)||(ID_temp > ((ctrl1<<13)|lowerSID)))
00382                                 {
00383                                         return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00384                                 }
00385                         }
00386                         entry = (ctrl1 << 29)|(dis1 << 28)|(lowerSID << 16)|  \
00387                                         (ctrl2 << 13)|(dis2 << 12)|(upperSID << 0);
00388                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] = entry;
00389                         CANAF_gstd_cnt++;
00390                         count++;
00391                         AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec = (SFF_GPR_Entry *)((uint32_t)(AFSection->SFF_GPR_Sec)+ sizeof(SFF_GPR_Entry));
00392                 }
00393         }
00394 
00395 /***** Setup Explicit Extend Frame Format Identifier Section *****/
00396         if(AFSection->EFF_Sec != NULL)
00397         {
00398                 for(i=0;i<(AFSection->EFF_NumEntry);i++)
00399                 {
00400                         if(count + 1 > 512)
00401                         {
00402                                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00403                         }
00404                         EID = AFSection->EFF_Sec->ID_29;
00405                         ctrl1 = AFSection->EFF_Sec->controller;
00406 
00407                         // check parameter
00408                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_29(EID));
00409                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl1));
00410 
00411                         entry = (ctrl1 << 29)|(EID << 0);
00412                         if(CANAF_ext_cnt != 0)
00413                         {
00414                                 buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count-1];
00415 //                              EID_temp = buf & 0x0FFFFFFF;
00416                                 if(buf > entry)
00417                                 {
00418                                         return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00419                                 }
00420                         }
00421                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count] = entry;
00422                         CANAF_ext_cnt ++;
00423                         count++;
00424                         AFSection->EFF_Sec = (EFF_Entry *)((uint32_t)(AFSection->EFF_Sec)+ sizeof(EFF_Entry));
00425                 }
00426         }
00427 
00428 /***** Setup Group of Extended Frame Format Identifier Section *****/
00429         if(AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec != NULL)
00430         {
00431                 for(i=0;i<(AFSection->EFF_GPR_NumEntry);i++)
00432                 {
00433                         if(count + 2 > 512)
00434                         {
00435                                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00436                         }
00437                         ctrl1 = AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec->controller1;
00438                         ctrl2 = AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec->controller2;
00439                         lowerEID = AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec->lowerEID;
00440                         upperEID = AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec->upperEID;
00441 
00442                         //check parameter
00443                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl1));
00444                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL(ctrl2));
00445                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_29(lowerEID));
00446                         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_29(upperEID));
00447 
00448                         entry = 0x00;
00449                         if(CANAF_gext_cnt != 0)
00450                         {
00451                                 buf = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count-1];
00452 //                              EID_temp = buf & 0x0FFFFFFF;
00453                                 if((ctrl1 != ctrl2) || (lowerEID > upperEID) || (buf > ((ctrl1 << 29)|(lowerEID << 0))))
00454                                 {
00455                                         return CAN_AF_ENTRY_ERROR;
00456                                 }
00457                         }
00458                         entry = (ctrl1 << 29)|(lowerEID << 0);
00459                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count++] = entry;
00460                         entry = (ctrl2 << 29)|(upperEID << 0);
00461                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[count++] = entry;
00462                         CANAF_gext_cnt++;
00463                         AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec = (EFF_GPR_Entry *)((uint32_t)(AFSection->EFF_GPR_Sec)+ sizeof(EFF_GPR_Entry));
00464                 }
00465         }
00466         //update address values
00467         LPC_CANAF->SFF_sa = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1)<<2;
00468         LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa = LPC_CANAF->SFF_sa + (((CANAF_std_cnt+1)>>1)<< 2);
00469         LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa = LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa + (CANAF_gstd_cnt << 2);
00470         LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa = LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa + (CANAF_ext_cnt << 2);
00471         LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable = LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa + (CANAF_gext_cnt << 3);
00472 
00473         if(FULLCAN_ENABLE == DISABLE)
00474         {
00475                 LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00; // Normal mode
00476         }
00477         else
00478         {
00479                 LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
00480         }
00481         return CAN_OK;
00482 }
00483 /********************************************************************/
00497 CAN_ERROR CAN_LoadExplicitEntry(LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, uint32_t id, CAN_ID_FORMAT_Type format)
00498 {
00499         uint32_t tmp0 = 0;
00500         uint32_t buf0=0, buf1=0;
00501         int16_t cnt1=0, cnt2=0, bound1=0, total=0;
00502 
00503 
00504         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00505         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_FORMAT(format));
00506 
00507         if (CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00508         {
00509                 tmp0 = 0;
00510         }
00511         else if (CANx == LPC_CAN2)
00512         {
00513                 tmp0 = 1;
00514         }
00515 
00516         /* Acceptance Filter Memory full - return */
00517         total =((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+ CANAF_FullCAN_cnt*3 +((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+  \
00518                         CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
00519         if (total >= 512){ //don't have enough space
00520                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00521         }
00522 
00523         /* Setup Acceptance Filter Configuration
00524     Acceptance Filter Mode Register = Off */
00525         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00000001;
00526 
00527 /*********** Add Explicit Standard Identifier Frame Format entry *********/
00528         if(format == STD_ID_FORMAT)
00529         {
00530                 id &= 0x07FF;
00531                 id |= (tmp0 << 13); /* Add controller number */
00532                 /* Move all remaining sections one place up
00533                 if new entry will increase FullCAN list */
00534                 if ((CANAF_std_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
00535                 {
00536                         cnt1   = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+((CANAF_std_cnt+1)>>1);
00537                         bound1 = total - cnt1;
00538                         buf0   = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00539                         while(bound1--)
00540                         {
00541                                 cnt1++;
00542                                 buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00543                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf0;
00544                                 buf0 = buf1;
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547                 if (CANAF_std_cnt == 0)
00548                 {
00549                         cnt2 = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1;
00550                         /* For entering first ID */
00551                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] = 0x0000FFFF | (id << 16);
00552                 }
00553                 else if (CANAF_std_cnt == 1)
00554                 {
00555                         cnt2 = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1;
00556                         /* For entering second ID */
00557                         if (((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] >> 16)& 0xE7FF) > id)
00558                         {
00559                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] >> 16) | (id << 16);
00560                         }
00561                         else
00562                         {
00563                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt2] & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00564                         }
00565                 }
00566                 else
00567                 {
00568                         /* Find where to insert new ID */
00569                         cnt1 = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1;
00570                         cnt2 = CANAF_std_cnt;
00571                         bound1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+((CANAF_std_cnt+1)>>1);
00572                         while (cnt1 < bound1)
00573                         {
00574                                 /* Loop through standard existing IDs */
00575                                 if (((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 16) & 0xE7FF) > id)
00576                                 {
00577                                         cnt2 = cnt1 * 2;
00578                                         break;
00579                                 }
00580 
00581                                 if ((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0x0000E7FF) > id)
00582                                 {
00583                                         cnt2 = cnt1 * 2 + 1;
00584                                         break;
00585                                 }
00586 
00587                                 cnt1++;
00588                         }
00589                         /* cnt1 = U32 where to insert new ID */
00590                         /* cnt2 = U16 where to insert new ID */
00591 
00592                         if (cnt1 == bound1)
00593                         {
00594                                 /* Adding ID as last entry */
00595                                 /* Even number of IDs exists */
00596                                 if ((CANAF_std_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
00597                                 {
00598                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]  = 0x0000FFFF | (id << 16);
00599                                 }
00600                                 /* Odd  number of IDs exists */
00601                                 else
00602                                 {
00603                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]  = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00604                                 }
00605                         }
00606                         else
00607                         {
00608                                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]; /* Remember current entry */
00609                                 if ((cnt2 & 0x0001) == 0)
00610                                 {
00611                                         /* Insert new mask to even address*/
00612                                         buf1 = (id << 16) | (buf0 >> 16);
00613                                 }
00614                                 else
00615                                 {
00616                                         /* Insert new mask to odd  address */
00617                                         buf1 = (buf0 & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00618                                 }
00619                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf1;/* Insert mask */
00620                                 bound1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+((CANAF_std_cnt+1)>>1)-1;
00621                                 /* Move all remaining standard mask entries one place up */
00622                                 while (cnt1 < bound1)
00623                                 {
00624                                         cnt1++;
00625                                         buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00626                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = (buf1 >> 16) | (buf0 << 16);
00627                                         buf0  = buf1;
00628                                 }
00629 
00630                                 if ((CANAF_std_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
00631                                 {
00632                                         /* Even number of IDs exists */
00633                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1] = (buf0 <<16) |(0x0000FFFF);
00634                                 }
00635                         }
00636                 }
00637                 CANAF_std_cnt++;
00638                 //update address values
00639                 LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa +=0x04 ;
00640                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     +=0x04 ;
00641                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa +=0x04;
00642                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable +=0x04;
00643         }
00644 
00645 /*********** Add Explicit Extended Identifier Frame Format entry *********/
00646         else
00647         {
00648                 /* Add controller number */
00649                 id |= (tmp0) << 29;
00650 
00651                 cnt1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+(((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1) + CANAF_gstd_cnt);
00652                 cnt2 = 0;
00653                 while (cnt2 < CANAF_ext_cnt)
00654                 {
00655                         /* Loop through extended existing masks*/
00656                         if (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] > id)
00657                         {
00658                                 break;
00659                         }
00660                         cnt1++;/* cnt1 = U32 where to insert new mask */
00661                         cnt2++;
00662                 }
00663 
00664                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];  /* Remember current entry */
00665                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = id;    /* Insert mask */
00666 
00667                 CANAF_ext_cnt++;
00668 
00669                 bound1 = total;
00670                 /* Move all remaining extended mask entries one place up*/
00671                 while (cnt2 < bound1)
00672                 {
00673                         cnt1++;
00674                         cnt2++;
00675                         buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00676                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf0;
00677                         buf0 = buf1;
00678                 }
00679                 /* update address values */
00680                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa += 4;
00681                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable += 4;
00682         }
00683         if(CANAF_FullCAN_cnt == 0) //not use FullCAN mode
00684         {
00685                 LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00;//not use FullCAN mode
00686         }
00687         else
00688         {
00689                 LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
00690         }
00691 
00692         return CAN_OK;
00693 }
00694 
00695 /********************************************************************/
00706 CAN_ERROR CAN_LoadFullCANEntry (LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, uint16_t id)
00707 {
00708         uint32_t ctrl0 = 0;
00709         uint32_t buf0=0, buf1=0, buf2=0;
00710         uint32_t tmp0=0, tmp1=0, tmp2=0;
00711         int16_t cnt1=0, cnt2=0, bound1=0, total=0;
00712         uint32_t abc;
00713 
00714         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00715 
00716         if (CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00717         {
00718                 ctrl0 = 0;
00719         }
00720         else if (CANx == LPC_CAN2)
00721         {
00722                 ctrl0 = 1;
00723         }
00724 
00725         /* Acceptance Filter Memory full - return */
00726         total =((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+ CANAF_FullCAN_cnt*3 +((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+  \
00727                         CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
00728         //don't have enough space for this fullCAN Entry and its Object(3*32 bytes)
00729         if ((total >=508)||(CANAF_FullCAN_cnt>=64)){
00730                 return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00731         }
00732         /* Setup Acceptance Filter Configuration
00733     Acceptance Filter Mode Register = Off */
00734         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00000001;
00735 
00736         /* Add mask for standard identifiers   */
00737         id &= 0x07FF;
00738         id |= (ctrl0 << 13) | (1 << 11); /* Add controller number */
00739 //      total = ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+ CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
00740         /* Move all remaining sections one place up
00741         if new entry will increase FullCAN list */
00742         if (((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)&&(total!=0))
00743         {
00744                 //then remove remaining section
00745                 cnt1   = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt >> 1);
00746                 bound1 = total;
00747                 buf0   = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00748 
00749                 while (bound1--)
00750                 {
00751                         cnt1++;
00752                         buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00753                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf0;
00754                         buf0 = buf1;
00755                 }
00756         }
00757         if (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt == 0)
00758         {
00759                 /* For entering first ID */
00760                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] = 0x0000FFFF | (id << 16);
00761         }
00762         else if (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt == 1)
00763         {
00764                 /* For entering second ID */
00765                 if (((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] >> 16)& 0xE7FF) > id)
00766                 {
00767                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] >> 16) | (id << 16);
00768                 }
00769                 else
00770                 {
00771                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[0] & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00772                 }
00773         }
00774         else
00775         {
00776                 /* Find where to insert new ID */
00777                 cnt1 = 0;
00778                 cnt2 = CANAF_FullCAN_cnt;
00779                 bound1 = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt - 1) >> 1;
00780                 while (cnt1 <= bound1)
00781                 {
00782                         abc = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 16)& 0xE7FF;
00783                         /* Loop through standard existing IDs */
00784                         if (((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 16) & 0xE7FF) > (id & 0xE7FF))
00785                         {
00786                                 cnt2 = cnt1 * 2;
00787                                 break;
00788                         }
00789 
00790                         abc = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0x0000E7FF;
00791                         if ((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0x0000E7FF) > (id & 0xE7FF))
00792                         {
00793                                 cnt2 = cnt1 * 2 + 1;
00794                                 break;
00795                         }
00796 
00797                         cnt1++;
00798                 }
00799                 /* cnt1 = U32 where to insert new ID */
00800                 /* cnt2 = U16 where to insert new ID */
00801 
00802                 if (cnt1 > bound1)
00803                 {
00804                         /* Adding ID as last entry */
00805                         /* Even number of IDs exists */
00806                         if ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
00807                         {
00808                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]  = 0x0000FFFF | (id << 16);
00809                         }
00810                         /* Odd  number of IDs exists */
00811                         else
00812                         {
00813                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]  = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00814                         }
00815                 }
00816                 else
00817                 {
00818                         buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]; /* Remember current entry */
00819                         if ((cnt2 & 0x0001) == 0)
00820                         {
00821                                 /* Insert new mask to even address*/
00822                                 buf1 = (id << 16) | (buf0 >> 16);
00823                         }
00824                         else
00825                         {
00826                                 /* Insert new mask to odd  address */
00827                                 buf1 = (buf0 & 0xFFFF0000) | id;
00828                         }
00829                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf1;/* Insert mask */
00830                         bound1 = CANAF_FullCAN_cnt >> 1;
00831                         /* Move all remaining standard mask entries one place up */
00832                         while (cnt1 < bound1)
00833                         {
00834                                 cnt1++;
00835                                 buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00836                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = (buf1 >> 16) | (buf0 << 16);
00837                                 buf0  = buf1;
00838                         }
00839 
00840                         if ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
00841                         {
00842                                 /* Even number of IDs exists */
00843                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = (LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] & 0xFFFF0000)
00844                                                                                         | (0x0000FFFF);
00845                         }
00846                 }
00847         }
00848         //restruct FulCAN Object Section
00849         bound1 = CANAF_FullCAN_cnt - cnt2;
00850         cnt1 = total - (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt)*3 + cnt2*3 + 1;
00851         buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00852         buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1];
00853         buf2 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+2];
00854         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]=LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1]= LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+2]=0x00;
00855         cnt1+=3;
00856         while(bound1--)
00857         {
00858                 tmp0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00859                 tmp1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1];
00860                 tmp2 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+2];
00861                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]= buf0;
00862                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1]= buf1;
00863                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+2]= buf2;
00864                 buf0 = tmp0;
00865                 buf1 = tmp1;
00866                 buf2 = tmp2;
00867                 cnt1+=3;
00868         }
00869         CANAF_FullCAN_cnt++;
00870         //update address values
00871         LPC_CANAF->SFF_sa         +=0x04;
00872         LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa +=0x04 ;
00873         LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     +=0x04 ;
00874         LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa +=0x04;
00875         LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable +=0x04;
00876 
00877         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
00878         return CAN_OK;
00879 }
00880 
00881 /********************************************************************/
00895 CAN_ERROR CAN_LoadGroupEntry(LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, uint32_t lowerID, \
00896                 uint32_t upperID, CAN_ID_FORMAT_Type format)
00897 {
00898         uint16_t tmp = 0;
00899         uint32_t buf0, buf1, entry1, entry2, LID,UID;
00900         int16_t cnt1, bound1, total;
00901         //LPC_CANAF_RAM_TypeDef *AFLUTTest = LPC_CANAF_RAM;
00902 
00903         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
00904         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_FORMAT(format));
00905 
00906         if(lowerID > upperID) return CAN_CONFLICT_ID_ERROR;
00907         if(CANx == LPC_CAN1)
00908         {
00909                 tmp = 0;
00910         }
00911         else
00912         {
00913                 tmp = 1;
00914         }
00915 
00916         total =((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+ CANAF_FullCAN_cnt*3 +((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+  \
00917                         CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
00918 
00919         /* Setup Acceptance Filter Configuration
00920         Acceptance Filter Mode Register = Off */
00921         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00000001;
00922 
00923 /*********Add Group of Standard Identifier Frame Format************/
00924         if(format == STD_ID_FORMAT)
00925         {
00926                 if ((total >= 512)){//don't have enough space
00927                         return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
00928                 }
00929                 lowerID &=0x7FF; //mask ID
00930                 upperID &=0x7FF;
00931                 entry1  = (tmp << 29)|(lowerID << 16)|(tmp << 13)|(upperID << 0);
00932                 cnt1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1);
00933 
00934                 //if this is the first Group standard ID entry
00935                 if(CANAF_gstd_cnt == 0)
00936                 {
00937                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
00938                 }
00939                 else
00940                 {
00941                         //find the position to add new Group entry
00942                         bound1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1) + CANAF_gstd_cnt;
00943                         while(cnt1 < bound1)
00944                         {
00945                                 //compare controller first
00946                                 while((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 29)< (entry1 >> 29))//increase until meet greater or equal controller
00947                                         cnt1++;
00948                                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00949                                 if((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 29)> (entry1 >> 29)) //meet greater controller
00950                                 {
00951                                         //add at this position
00952                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
00953                                         break;
00954                                 }
00955                                 else //meet equal controller
00956                                 {
00957                                         LID  = (buf0 >> 16)&0x7FF;
00958                                         UID  = buf0 & 0x7FF;
00959                                         if (upperID <= LID)
00960                                         {
00961                                                 //add new entry before this entry
00962                                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
00963                                                 break;
00964                                         }
00965                                         else if (lowerID >= UID)
00966                                         {
00967                                                 //load next entry to compare
00968                                                 cnt1 ++;
00969                                         }
00970                                         else
00971                                                 return CAN_CONFLICT_ID_ERROR;
00972                                 }
00973                         }
00974                         if(cnt1 >= bound1)
00975                         {
00976                                 //add new entry at the last position in this list
00977                                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00978                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
00979                         }
00980 
00981                         //remove all remaining entry of this section one place up
00982                         bound1 = total - cnt1;
00983                         while(bound1--)
00984                         {
00985                                 cnt1++;
00986                                 buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
00987                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = buf0;
00988                                 buf0 = buf1;
00989                         }
00990                 }
00991                 CANAF_gstd_cnt++;
00992                 //update address values
00993                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     +=0x04 ;
00994                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa +=0x04;
00995                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable +=0x04;
00996         }
00997 
00998 
00999 /*********Add Group of Extended Identifier Frame Format************/
01000         else
01001         {
01002                 if ((total >= 511)){//don't have enough space
01003                         return CAN_OBJECTS_FULL_ERROR;
01004                 }
01005                 lowerID  &= 0x1FFFFFFF; //mask ID
01006                 upperID &= 0x1FFFFFFF;
01007                 entry1   = (tmp << 29)|(lowerID << 0);
01008                 entry2   = (tmp << 29)|(upperID << 0);
01009 
01010                 cnt1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1) + CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt;
01011                 //if this is the first Group standard ID entry
01012                 if(CANAF_gext_cnt == 0)
01013                 {
01014                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
01015                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1] = entry2;
01016                 }
01017                 else
01018                 {
01019                         //find the position to add new Group entry
01020                         bound1 = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1) + CANAF_gstd_cnt \
01021                                                 + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
01022                         while(cnt1 < bound1)
01023                         {
01024                                 while((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >>29)< tmp) //increase until meet greater or equal controller
01025                                         cnt1++;
01026                                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
01027                                 buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1];
01028                                 if((LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] >> 29)> (entry1 >> 29)) //meet greater controller
01029                                 {
01030                                         //add at this position
01031                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
01032                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[++cnt1] = entry2;
01033                                         break;
01034                                 }
01035                                 else //meet equal controller
01036                                 {
01037                                         LID  = buf0 & 0x1FFFFFFF; //mask ID
01038                                         UID  = buf1 & 0x1FFFFFFF;
01039                                         if (upperID <= LID)
01040                                         {
01041                                                 //add new entry before this entry
01042                                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1] = entry1;
01043                                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[++cnt1] = entry2;
01044                                                 break;
01045                                         }
01046                                         else if (lowerID >= UID)
01047                                         {
01048                                                 //load next entry to compare
01049                                                 cnt1 +=2;
01050                                         }
01051                                         else
01052                                                 return CAN_CONFLICT_ID_ERROR;
01053                                 }
01054                         }
01055                         if(cnt1 >= bound1)
01056                         {
01057                                 //add new entry at the last position in this list
01058                                 buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
01059                                 buf1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1];
01060                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]   = entry1;
01061                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[++cnt1] = entry2;
01062                         }
01063                         //remove all remaining entry of this section two place up
01064                         bound1 = total - cnt1 + 1;
01065                         cnt1++;
01066                         while(bound1>0)
01067                         {
01068                                 entry1 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1];
01069                                 entry2 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1];
01070                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1]   = buf0;
01071                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt1+1] = buf1;
01072                                 buf0 = entry1;
01073                                 buf1 = entry2;
01074                                 cnt1   +=2;
01075                                 bound1 -=2;
01076                         }
01077                 }
01078                 CANAF_gext_cnt++;
01079                 //update address values
01080                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable +=0x08;
01081         }
01082         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
01083         return CAN_OK;
01084 }
01085 
01086 /********************************************************************/
01100 CAN_ERROR CAN_RemoveEntry(AFLUT_ENTRY_Type EntryType, uint16_t position)
01101 {
01102         uint16_t cnt, bound, total;
01103         uint32_t buf0, buf1;
01104         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_AFLUT_ENTRY_TYPE(EntryType));
01105         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_POSITION(position));
01106 
01107         /* Setup Acceptance Filter Configuration
01108         Acceptance Filter Mode Register = Off */
01109         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00000001;
01110         total = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1) + \
01111                         CANAF_gstd_cnt + CANAF_ext_cnt + (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1);
01112 
01113 
01114 /************** Remove FullCAN Entry *************/
01115         if(EntryType == FULLCAN_ENTRY)
01116         {
01117                 if((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt==0)||(position >= CANAF_FullCAN_cnt))
01118                 {
01119                         return CAN_ENTRY_NOT_EXIT_ERROR;
01120                 }
01121                 else
01122                 {
01123                         cnt = position >> 1;
01124                         buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01125                         bound = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt - position -1)>>1;
01126                         if((position & 0x0001) == 0) //event position
01127                         {
01128                                 while(bound--)
01129                                 {
01130                                         //remove all remaining FullCAN entry one place down
01131                                         buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1];
01132                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf1 >> 16) | (buf0 << 16);
01133                                         buf0  = buf1;
01134                                         cnt++;
01135                                 }
01136                         }
01137                         else //odd position
01138                         {
01139                                 while(bound--)
01140                                 {
01141                                         //remove all remaining FullCAN entry one place down
01142                                         buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1];
01143                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf0 & 0xFFFF0000)|(buf1 >> 16);
01144                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1] << 16;
01145                                         buf0  = buf1<<16;
01146                                         cnt++;
01147                                 }
01148                         }
01149                         if((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
01150                         {
01151                                 if((position & 0x0001)==0)
01152                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf0 << 16) | (0x0000FFFF);
01153                                 else
01154                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = buf0 | 0x0000FFFF;
01155                         }
01156                         else
01157                         {
01158                                 //remove all remaining section one place down
01159                                 cnt = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1;
01160                                 bound = total + CANAF_FullCAN_cnt * 3;
01161                                 while(bound>cnt)
01162                                 {
01163                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01164                                         cnt++;
01165                                 }
01166                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1]=0x00;
01167                                 //update address values
01168                                 LPC_CANAF->SFF_sa         -=0x04;
01169                                 LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa -=0x04 ;
01170                                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     -=0x04 ;
01171                                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa -=0x04;
01172                                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable -=0x04;
01173                         }
01174                         CANAF_FullCAN_cnt--;
01175 
01176                         //delete its FullCAN Object in the FullCAN Object section
01177                         //remove all remaining FullCAN Object three place down
01178                         cnt = total + position * 3;
01179                         bound = (CANAF_FullCAN_cnt - position + 1) * 3;
01180 
01181                         while(bound)
01182                         {
01183                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt]=LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+3];;
01184                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1]=LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+4];
01185                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+2]=LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+5];
01186                                 bound -=3;
01187                                 cnt   +=3;
01188                         }
01189                 }
01190         }
01191 
01192 /************** Remove Explicit Standard ID Entry *************/
01193         else if(EntryType == EXPLICIT_STANDARD_ENTRY)
01194         {
01195                 if((CANAF_std_cnt==0)||(position >= CANAF_std_cnt))
01196                 {
01197                         return CAN_ENTRY_NOT_EXIT_ERROR;
01198                 }
01199                 else
01200                 {
01201                         cnt = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt+1)>>1)+ (position >> 1);
01202                         buf0 = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01203                         bound = (CANAF_std_cnt - position - 1)>>1;
01204                         if((position & 0x0001) == 0) //event position
01205                         {
01206                                 while(bound--)
01207                                 {
01208                                         //remove all remaining FullCAN entry one place down
01209                                         buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1];
01210                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf1 >> 16) | (buf0 << 16);
01211                                         buf0  = buf1;
01212                                         cnt++;
01213                                 }
01214                         }
01215                         else //odd position
01216                         {
01217                                 while(bound--)
01218                                 {
01219                                         //remove all remaining FullCAN entry one place down
01220                                         buf1  = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1];
01221                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf0 & 0xFFFF0000)|(buf1 >> 16);
01222                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1] << 16;
01223                                         buf0  = buf1<<16;
01224                                         cnt++;
01225                                 }
01226                         }
01227                         if((CANAF_std_cnt & 0x0001) == 0)
01228                         {
01229                                 if((position & 0x0001)==0)
01230                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = (buf0 << 16) | (0x0000FFFF);
01231                                 else
01232                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = buf0 | 0x0000FFFF;
01233                         }
01234                         else
01235                         {
01236                                 //remove all remaining section one place down
01237                                 cnt = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1);
01238                                 bound = total + CANAF_FullCAN_cnt * 3;
01239                                 while(bound>cnt)
01240                                 {
01241                                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01242                                         cnt++;
01243                                 }
01244                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1]=0x00;
01245                                 //update address value
01246                                 LPC_CANAF->SFF_GRP_sa -=0x04 ;
01247                                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     -=0x04 ;
01248                                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa -=0x04;
01249                                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable -=0x04;
01250                         }
01251                         CANAF_std_cnt--;
01252                 }
01253         }
01254 
01255 /************** Remove Group of Standard ID Entry *************/
01256         else if(EntryType == GROUP_STANDARD_ENTRY)
01257         {
01258                 if((CANAF_gstd_cnt==0)||(position >= CANAF_gstd_cnt))
01259                 {
01260                         return CAN_ENTRY_NOT_EXIT_ERROR;
01261                 }
01262                 else
01263                 {
01264                         cnt = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+ position + 1;
01265                         bound = total + CANAF_FullCAN_cnt * 3;
01266                         while (cnt<bound)
01267                         {
01268                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01269                                 cnt++;
01270                         }
01271                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1]=0x00;
01272                 }
01273                 CANAF_gstd_cnt--;
01274                 //update address value
01275                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_sa     -=0x04;
01276                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa -=0x04;
01277                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable -=0x04;
01278         }
01279 
01280 /************** Remove Explicit Extended ID Entry *************/
01281         else if(EntryType == EXPLICIT_EXTEND_ENTRY)
01282         {
01283                 if((CANAF_ext_cnt==0)||(position >= CANAF_ext_cnt))
01284                 {
01285                         return CAN_ENTRY_NOT_EXIT_ERROR;
01286                 }
01287                 else
01288                 {
01289                         cnt = ((CANAF_FullCAN_cnt + 1)>>1) + ((CANAF_std_cnt + 1) >> 1)+ CANAF_gstd_cnt + position + 1;
01290                         bound = total + CANAF_FullCAN_cnt * 3;
01291                         while (cnt<bound)
01292                         {
01293                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt];
01294                                 cnt++;
01295                         }
01296                         LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt-1]=0x00;
01297                 }
01298                 CANAF_ext_cnt--;
01299                 LPC_CANAF->EFF_GRP_sa -=0x04;
01300                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable -=0x04;
01301         }
01302 
01303 /************** Remove Group of Extended ID Entry *************/
01304         else
01305         {
01306                 if((CANAF_gext_cnt==0)||(position >= CANAF_gext_cnt))
01307                 {
01308                         return CAN_ENTRY_NOT_EXIT_ERROR;
01309                 }
01310                 else
01311                 {
01312                         cnt = total - (CANAF_gext_cnt<<1) + (position<<1);
01313                         bound = total + CANAF_FullCAN_cnt * 3;
01314                         while (cnt<bound)
01315                         {
01316                                 //remove all remaining entry two place up
01317                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+2];
01318                                 LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+1] = LPC_CANAF_RAM->mask[cnt+3];
01319                                 cnt+=2;
01320                         }
01321                 }
01322                 CANAF_gext_cnt--;
01323                 LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable -=0x08;
01324         }
01325         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
01326         return CAN_OK;
01327 }
01328 
01329 /********************************************************************/
01340 Status CAN_SendMsg (LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx, CAN_MSG_Type *CAN_Msg)
01341 {
01342         uint32_t data;
01343         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01344         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_FORMAT(CAN_Msg->format));
01345         if(CAN_Msg->format==STD_ID_FORMAT)
01346         {
01347                 CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_11(CAN_Msg->id));
01348         }
01349         else
01350         {
01351                 CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ID_29(CAN_Msg->id));
01352         }
01353         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_DLC(CAN_Msg->len));
01354         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FRAME_TYPE(CAN_Msg->type));
01355 
01356         //Check status of Transmit Buffer 1
01357         if (CANx->SR & (1<<2))
01358         {
01359                 /* Transmit Channel 1 is available */
01360                 /* Write frame informations and frame data into its CANxTFI1,
01361                  * CANxTID1, CANxTDA1, CANxTDB1 register */
01362                 CANx->TFI1 &= ~0x000F0000;
01363                 CANx->TFI1 |= (CAN_Msg->len)<<16;
01364                 if(CAN_Msg->type == REMOTE_FRAME)
01365                 {
01366                         CANx->TFI1 |= (1<<30); //set bit RTR
01367                 }
01368                 else
01369                 {
01370                         CANx->TFI1 &= ~(1<<30);
01371                 }
01372                 if(CAN_Msg->format == EXT_ID_FORMAT)
01373                 {
01374                         CANx->TFI1 |= (1<<31); //set bit FF
01375                 }
01376                 else
01377                 {
01378                         CANx->TFI1 &= ~(1<<31);
01379                 }
01380 
01381                 /* Write CAN ID*/
01382                 CANx->TID1 = CAN_Msg->id;
01383 
01384                 /*Write first 4 data bytes*/
01385                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataA[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataA[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[3])<<24);
01386                 CANx->TDA1 = data;
01387 
01388                 /*Write second 4 data bytes*/
01389                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataB[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataB[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[3])<<24);
01390                 CANx->TDB1 = data;
01391 
01392                  /*Write transmission request*/
01393                  CANx->CMR = 0x21;
01394                  return SUCCESS;
01395         }
01396         //check status of Transmit Buffer 2
01397         else if(CANx->SR & (1<<10))
01398         {
01399                 /* Transmit Channel 2 is available */
01400                 /* Write frame informations and frame data into its CANxTFI2,
01401                  * CANxTID2, CANxTDA2, CANxTDB2 register */
01402                 CANx->TFI2 &= ~0x000F0000;
01403                 CANx->TFI2 |= (CAN_Msg->len)<<16;
01404                 if(CAN_Msg->type == REMOTE_FRAME)
01405                 {
01406                         CANx->TFI2 |= (1<<30); //set bit RTR
01407                 }
01408                 else
01409                 {
01410                         CANx->TFI2 &= ~(1<<30);
01411                 }
01412                 if(CAN_Msg->format == EXT_ID_FORMAT)
01413                 {
01414                         CANx->TFI2 |= (1<<31); //set bit FF
01415                 }
01416                 else
01417                 {
01418                         CANx->TFI2 &= ~(1<<31);
01419                 }
01420 
01421                 /* Write CAN ID*/
01422                 CANx->TID2 = CAN_Msg->id;
01423 
01424                 /*Write first 4 data bytes*/
01425                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataA[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataA[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[3])<<24);
01426                 CANx->TDA2 = data;
01427 
01428                 /*Write second 4 data bytes*/
01429                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataB[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataB[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[3])<<24);
01430                 CANx->TDB2 = data;
01431 
01432                 /*Write transmission request*/
01433                 CANx->CMR = 0x41;
01434                 return SUCCESS;
01435         }
01436         //check status of Transmit Buffer 3
01437         else if (CANx->SR & (1<<18))
01438         {
01439                 /* Transmit Channel 3 is available */
01440                 /* Write frame informations and frame data into its CANxTFI3,
01441                  * CANxTID3, CANxTDA3, CANxTDB3 register */
01442                 CANx->TFI3 &= ~0x000F0000;
01443                 CANx->TFI3 |= (CAN_Msg->len)<<16;
01444                 if(CAN_Msg->type == REMOTE_FRAME)
01445                 {
01446                         CANx->TFI3 |= (1<<30); //set bit RTR
01447                 }
01448                 else
01449                 {
01450                         CANx->TFI3 &= ~(1<<30);
01451                 }
01452                 if(CAN_Msg->format == EXT_ID_FORMAT)
01453                 {
01454                         CANx->TFI3 |= (1<<31); //set bit FF
01455                 }
01456                 else
01457                 {
01458                         CANx->TFI3 &= ~(1<<31);
01459                 }
01460 
01461                 /* Write CAN ID*/
01462                 CANx->TID3 = CAN_Msg->id;
01463 
01464                 /*Write first 4 data bytes*/
01465                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataA[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataA[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataA[3])<<24);
01466                 CANx->TDA3 = data;
01467 
01468                 /*Write second 4 data bytes*/
01469                 data = (CAN_Msg->dataB[0])|(((CAN_Msg->dataB[1]))<<8)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[2])<<16)|((CAN_Msg->dataB[3])<<24);
01470                 CANx->TDB3 = data;
01471 
01472                 /*Write transmission request*/
01473                 CANx->CMR = 0x81;
01474                 return SUCCESS;
01475         }
01476         else
01477         {
01478                 return ERROR;
01479         }
01480 }
01481 
01482 /********************************************************************/
01493 Status CAN_ReceiveMsg (LPC_CAN_TypeDef *CANx, CAN_MSG_Type *CAN_Msg)
01494 {
01495         uint32_t data;
01496 
01497         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01498 
01499         //check status of Receive Buffer
01500         if((CANx->SR &0x00000001))
01501         {
01502                 /* Receive message is available */
01503                 /* Read frame informations */
01504                 CAN_Msg->format   = (uint8_t)(((CANx->RFS) & 0x80000000)>>31);
01505                 CAN_Msg->type     = (uint8_t)(((CANx->RFS) & 0x40000000)>>30);
01506                 CAN_Msg->len      = (uint8_t)(((CANx->RFS) & 0x000F0000)>>16);
01507 
01508 
01509                 /* Read CAN message identifier */
01510                 CAN_Msg->id = CANx->RID;
01511 
01512                 /* Read the data if received message was DATA FRAME */
01513                 if (CAN_Msg->type == DATA_FRAME)
01514                 {
01515                         /* Read first 4 data bytes */
01516                         data = CANx->RDA;
01517                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[0])= data & 0x000000FF;
01518                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[1])= (data & 0x0000FF00)>>8;;
01519                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[2])= (data & 0x00FF0000)>>16;
01520                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[3])= (data & 0xFF000000)>>24;
01521 
01522                         /* Read second 4 data bytes */
01523                         data = CANx->RDB;
01524                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[0])= data & 0x000000FF;
01525                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[1])= (data & 0x0000FF00)>>8;
01526                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[2])= (data & 0x00FF0000)>>16;
01527                         *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[3])= (data & 0xFF000000)>>24;
01528 
01529                 /*release receive buffer*/
01530                 CANx->CMR = 0x04;
01531                 }
01532                 else
01533                 {
01534                         /* Received Frame is a Remote Frame, not have data, we just receive
01535                          * message information only */
01536                         CANx->CMR = 0x04; /*release receive buffer*/
01537                         return SUCCESS;
01538                 }
01539         }
01540         else
01541         {
01542                 // no receive message available
01543                 return ERROR;
01544         }
01545         return SUCCESS;
01546 }
01547 
01548 /********************************************************************/
01558 CAN_ERROR FCAN_ReadObj (LPC_CANAF_TypeDef* CANAFx, CAN_MSG_Type *CAN_Msg)
01559 {
01560         uint32_t *pSrc, data;
01561         uint32_t interrut_word, msg_idx, test_bit, head_idx, tail_idx;
01562 
01563         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANAFx(CANAFx));
01564 
01565         interrut_word = 0;
01566 
01567         if (LPC_CANAF->FCANIC0 != 0)
01568         {
01569                 interrut_word = LPC_CANAF->FCANIC0;
01570                 head_idx = 0;
01571                 tail_idx = 31;
01572         }
01573         else if (LPC_CANAF->FCANIC1 != 0)
01574         {
01575                 interrut_word = LPC_CANAF->FCANIC1;
01576                 head_idx = 32;
01577                 tail_idx = 63;
01578         }
01579 
01580         if (interrut_word != 0)
01581         {
01582                 /* Detect for interrupt pending */
01583                 msg_idx = 0;
01584                 for (msg_idx = head_idx; msg_idx <= tail_idx; msg_idx++)
01585                 {
01586                         test_bit = interrut_word & 0x1;
01587                         interrut_word = interrut_word >> 1;
01588 
01589                         if (test_bit)
01590                         {
01591                                 pSrc = (uint32_t *) (LPC_CANAF->ENDofTable + LPC_CANAF_RAM_BASE + msg_idx * 12);
01592 
01593                         /* Has been finished updating the content */
01594                         if ((*pSrc & 0x03000000L) == 0x03000000L)
01595                         {
01596                                 /*clear semaphore*/
01597                                 *pSrc &= 0xFCFFFFFF;
01598 
01599                                 /*Set to DatA*/
01600                                 pSrc++;
01601                                 /* Copy to dest buf */
01602                                 data = *pSrc;
01603                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[0])= data & 0x000000FF;
01604                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[1])= (data & 0x0000FF00)>>8;
01605                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[2])= (data & 0x00FF0000)>>16;
01606                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataA[3])= (data & 0xFF000000)>>24;
01607 
01608                                 /*Set to DatB*/
01609                                 pSrc++;
01610                                 /* Copy to dest buf */
01611                                 data = *pSrc;
01612                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[0])= data & 0x000000FF;
01613                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[1])= (data & 0x0000FF00)>>8;
01614                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[2])= (data & 0x00FF0000)>>16;
01615                                 *((uint8_t *) &CAN_Msg->dataB[3])= (data & 0xFF000000)>>24;
01616                                 /*Back to Dat1*/
01617                                 pSrc -= 2;
01618 
01619                                 CAN_Msg->id = *pSrc & 0x7FF;
01620                                 CAN_Msg->len = (uint8_t) (*pSrc >> 16) & 0x0F;
01621                                         CAN_Msg->format = 0; //FullCAN Object ID always is 11-bit value
01622                                         CAN_Msg->type = (uint8_t)(*pSrc >> 30) &0x01;
01623                                 /*Re-read semaphore*/
01624                                 if ((*pSrc & 0x03000000L) == 0)
01625                                 {
01626                                         return CAN_OK;
01627                                 }
01628                         }
01629                         }
01630                 }
01631         }
01632         return CAN_FULL_OBJ_NOT_RCV;
01633 }
01634 /********************************************************************/
01647 uint32_t CAN_GetCTRLStatus (LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, CAN_CTRL_STS_Type arg)
01648 {
01649         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01650         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CTRL_STS_TYPE(arg));
01651 
01652         switch (arg)
01653         {
01654         case CANCTRL_GLOBAL_STS:
01655                 return CANx->GSR;
01656 
01657         case CANCTRL_INT_CAP:
01658                 return CANx->ICR;
01659 
01660         case CANCTRL_ERR_WRN:
01661                 return CANx->EWL;
01662 
01663         default: // CANCTRL_STS
01664                 return CANx->SR;
01665         }
01666 }
01667 /********************************************************************/
01677 uint32_t CAN_GetCRStatus (LPC_CANCR_TypeDef* CANCRx, CAN_CR_STS_Type arg)
01678 {
01679         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANCRx(CANCRx));
01680         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CR_STS_TYPE(arg));
01681 
01682         switch (arg)
01683         {
01684         case CANCR_TX_STS:
01685                 return CANCRx->CANTxSR;
01686 
01687         case CANCR_RX_STS:
01688                 return CANCRx->CANRxSR;
01689 
01690         default:        // CANCR_MS
01691                 return CANCRx->CANMSR;
01692         }
01693 }
01694 /********************************************************************/
01718 void CAN_IRQCmd (LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, CAN_INT_EN_Type arg, FunctionalState NewState)
01719 {
01720         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01721         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_INT_EN_TYPE(arg));
01722         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
01723 
01724         if(NewState == ENABLE)
01725         {
01726                 if(arg==CANINT_FCE)
01727                 {
01728                         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x01;
01729                         LPC_CANAF->FCANIE = 0x01;
01730                         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x04;
01731                 }
01732                 else
01733                         CANx->IER |= (1 << arg);
01734         }
01735         else
01736         {
01737                 if(arg==CANINT_FCE){
01738                         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x01;
01739                         LPC_CANAF->FCANIE = 0x01;
01740                         LPC_CANAF->AFMR = 0x00;
01741                 }
01742                 else
01743                         CANx->IER &= ~(1 << arg);
01744         }
01745 }

01747 /********************************************************************/
01757 void CAN_SetAFMode (LPC_CANAF_TypeDef* CANAFx, CAN_AFMODE_Type AFMode)
01758 {
01759         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANAFx(CANAFx));
01760         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_AFMODE_TYPE(AFMode));
01761 
01762         switch(AFMode)
01763         {
01764         case CAN_Normal:
01765                 CANAFx->AFMR = 0x00;
01766                 break;
01767         case CAN_AccOff:
01768                 CANAFx->AFMR = 0x01;
01769                 break;
01770         case CAN_AccBP:
01771                 CANAFx->AFMR = 0x02;
01772                 break;
01773         case CAN_eFCAN:
01774                 CANAFx->AFMR = 0x04;
01775                 break;
01776         }
01777 }

01779 /********************************************************************/
01798 void CAN_ModeConfig(LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, CAN_MODE_Type mode, FunctionalState NewState)
01799 {
01800         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01801         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_MODE_TYPE(mode));
01802         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
01803 
01804         switch(mode)
01805         {
01806         case CAN_OPERATING_MODE:
01807                 CANx->MOD = 0x00;
01808                 break;
01809         case CAN_RESET_MODE:
01810                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01811                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_RM;
01812                 else
01813                         CANx->MOD &= ~CAN_MOD_RM;
01814                 break;
01815         case CAN_LISTENONLY_MODE:
01816                 CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_RM;//Enter Reset mode
01817                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01818                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_LOM;
01819                 else
01820                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_LOM;
01821                 CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_RM;//Release Reset mode
01822                 break;
01823         case CAN_SELFTEST_MODE:
01824                 CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_RM;//Enter Reset mode
01825                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01826                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_STM;
01827                 else
01828                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_STM;
01829                 CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_RM;//Release Reset mode
01830                 break;
01831         case CAN_TXPRIORITY_MODE:
01832                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01833                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_TPM;
01834                 else
01835                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_TPM;
01836                 break;
01837         case CAN_SLEEP_MODE:
01838                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01839                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_SM;
01840                 else
01841                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_SM;
01842                 break;
01843         case CAN_RXPOLARITY_MODE:
01844                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01845                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_RPM;
01846                 else
01847                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_RPM;
01848                 break;
01849         case CAN_TEST_MODE:
01850                 if(NewState == ENABLE)
01851                         CANx->MOD |=CAN_MOD_TM;
01852                 else
01853                         CANx->MOD &=~CAN_MOD_TM;
01854                 break;
01855         }
01856 }
01857 /*********************************************************************/
01873 void CAN_SetCommand(LPC_CAN_TypeDef* CANx, uint32_t CMRType)
01874 {
01875         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANx(CANx));
01876         CANx->CMR |= CMRType;
01877 }

01899 IntStatus CAN_FullCANIntGetStatus (LPC_CANAF_TypeDef* CANAFx)
01900 {

01902         if (CANAFx->FCANIE)
01903                 return SET;
01904         return RESET;
01905 }

01915 uint32_t CAN_FullCANPendGetStatus(LPC_CANAF_TypeDef* CANAFx, FullCAN_IC_Type type)
01916 {
01917         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_CANAFx(CANAFx));
01918         CHECK_PARAM( PARAM_FULLCAN_IC(type));
01919         if (type == FULLCAN_IC0)
01920                 return CANAFx->FCANIC0;
01921         return CANAFx->FCANIC1;
01922 }
